Our Mission Statement

By focusing on our three-pronged approach, we focus our attention entirely on our range of services, our b readth of technology and our comfortable prices. We believe that these three thrust areas will give our Cyprus domain users a holistic and fantastic web hosting experience.

Our Portfolio of Services

Our portfolio of services includes Cyprus hosting, apart from Web Hosting Automation Solutions, Domain Name Registration, Domain Forwarding, Managed DNS Services, Mail Solutions, among many others.

Right from choosing the most appropriate website domain name, we’re with you. Since this is your online identity, you need to be cautious and choose the right one so that your users find it memorable. To get the right name, research well just as we do so that your Cyprus domain name enters the Top Level Domain (TLD)—something like .com or .com.cy.

You can choose to have a .com to get a high ranking on the search engines. But if you want the world to know that you are Cyprus-based, it’s best to have a .com.cy at the end of your domain name, though it may be expensive, restricted and slow to get.
